MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField CreateTemplateField (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField dataControlField, System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl dataBoundControl);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField CreateTemplateField(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField dataControlField, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed

Docs.param: The data-bound control that contains the data field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method is invoked when you click on the link to convert a data field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> in the fields editor.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Docs.value: The default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.

The data entry mode for the control.
Docs.summary: Gets an unique ID for a control that is created when a data field is converted into a .
Docs.returns: A unique ID for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.GetNewDataSourceName%2A> method is a helper method that can be used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method to generate unique IDs for the controls that are created when you click the link to convert a data field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> in the fields editor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.GetTemplateField%2A> method is a helper method that can be used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method to create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object and initialize its properties using the specified data field properties.

Docs.summary: Gets the service provider implementation that is used by the fields editor.
